title: You Say Tomato
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The emphasis here is on local foods and can accommodate vegans. Menu includes quiche, flatbreads, galette, sandwiches, and daily specials. Try the roasted breakfast potatoes. Could substitute soy milk in coffee and in the oatmeal/granola breakfast. Open atmosphere with Wi-Fi and usually busy.
